EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-06-11-TUG-Atlanta.Email 4.Email 4
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance - Atlanta Turbonomic User Group
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=friend}},
We’re just 5 days away from the Atlanta Technology User Group meeting, and I don’t want you to miss out!
You’ll be joined by Turbonomic users from companies like Travelport, Macy's, IntercontinentalExchange and Manhattan Associates, as we discuss best practices in hybrid cloud management and cutting-edge technology trends. No to mention, lunch and refreshments are on the house.
Don’t forget to register today <[[https://bit.ly/tug-atlanta]]>. I look forward to meeting you on June 11.
Best, Steve
Steve Senecal Atlanta TUG President Manager of Global Engineering, Travelport 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087 contact us <[[http://go.vmturbo.com/contact-us.html?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker]]> | website <[[http://www.turbonomic.com?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker]]> | privacy policy <[[http://www.turbonomic.com/privacy-policy?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker]]>
